name: Vector
description: A Vector composed of components (X, Y, Z) with floating point precision. Used mainly for entity position.

functions.name: Equals
functions.description: Check against another vector for equality, within specified error limits
functions.description_long: Check if the vector is equal to another vector, within specified error limits

return.description: Are the vectors equal or not

parameters.name: other
parameters.description: The vector to get the distance to

functions.name: DistanceSquared
functions.description_long: Return the squared distance of 2 vectors

return.description: The squared distance betweem the vectors

parameters.name: other
parameters.description: The vector to get the squared distance to

functions.name: GetUnsafeNormal
functions.description: Calculates normalized version of vector without checking for zero length
functions.description_long: Returns the normalized version of vector without checking for zero length

functions.name: GetSafeNormal
functions.description: Gets a normalized copy of the vector, checking it is safe to do so based on the length
functions.description_long: Returns a normalized copy of the vector, checking it is safe to do so based on the length

functions.name: IsNearlyZero
functions.description: Checks whether vector is near to zero within a specified tolerance

return.description: If the bool is near to zero

functions.name: IsZero
functions.description: Checks whether all components of the vector are exactly zero

return.description: If all components of the vector are exactly zero

functions.name: Normalize
functions.description: Normalize this vector in-place if it is larger than a given tolerance. Leaves it unchanged if not

return.description: If the vector has been modified

functions.name: Size
functions.description: Get the length (magnitude) of this vector

functions.name: SizeSquared
functions.description: Get the squared length of this vector

return.description: The squared length of the vector

functions.name: Rotation
functions.description: Returns the orientation corresponding to the direction in which the vector points
